author: yoshiki
msg: Rollback Japanese documents to the version before auth rewrite.
Note these may or may not correspond to the latest English documents.
These are simply retrieved from CVS.  Updates will be done later.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Rewrite how proxy sends its request to allow input bodies to morph the request
bodies.  Previously, if an input filter changed the request body, the
original C-L would be sent which would be incorrect.
Due to HTTP compliance, we must either send the body T-E: chunked or include
a C-L for the request body.  Connection: Close is not an option.
